sentences.sContent: What you're hearing is the voice of complacence.
sentences.sContent_eng: What you're hearing is the voice of complacence.
sentences.sCn: 你听到的是沾沾自喜的声音。

sentences.sContent: She made no further progress because of complacence.
sentences.sContent_eng: She made no further progress because of complacence.
sentences.sCn: 由于自满，她没有取得进一步进展。
